author: justindrake
content: For question 2, the sequencer extracts the MEV but the sequencer can be the L1 (see based rollups). For question 3, tips are a subset of MEV and will continue to be required. For question 4, if the cost of money is set by the broader market than the equilibrium staking APR is invariant to the amount of MEV given to stakers.

author: decentmuse
content:
Thank you kindly for taking the time to reply, you're the man.  

I also hear there's something interesting coming down the pipeline in terms of based rollup architecture so looking forward to learning more about that as well!
